package.name: AdBlock ++
package.shortDescription: Blocking ads in ++ tweaks. Tested on Instagram ++ (1.8r-263), WhatsApp ++ (1.6r-105), Rocket for Instagram (3.5.3) , Cercube for YouTube (5.1.14), Watusi 2 for WhatsApp (1.2.3).

descriptionlist.description: This is an package will full depictions.
Attention ! In Cercube, to disable ads, you must sign in and verify your email address.
